text: Na'ankure bulimakao afumofo anankempi kare'namare zafama nentaza zafagna hu'za kinama huzmante'neza knama nezami'za vahera, Midieni vahe'ma hu'nanaza hunka knama zamiza zamazeri haviza nehaza vahera zamahe pasaru nehunka, knazama nezamiza zama eri atrenka zamagu'ma vazi'nana zanku anara hugahaze.
